generatedTitle: "Nothin' But a Good Time": Poison's Hit Single from "Open Up and Say...Ahh!" Album

extractFactDictList.question: Who sings the song 'Nothin' But a Good Time'?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The song 'Nothin' But a Good Time' is sung by the hard rock/glam metal group Poison.

extractFactDictList.question: What is the song 'Nothin' But a Good Time' the first single from?
extractFactDictList.sentence: It's the first single from their second studio album 'Open Up and Say... Ahh!'.

extractFactDictList.question: When was the song 'Nothin' But a Good Time' released as a single?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The song was released as a single in 1988.

extractFactDictList.question: What position did the song 'Nothin' But a Good Time' reach on the Billboard Hot 100 chart?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The song was released as a single in 1988 and reached #6 on the Billboard Hot 100 and #19 on the Mainstream rock charts.

extractFactDictList.question: What position did the song 'Nothin' But a Good Time' reach on the Mainstream rock charts?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The song was released as a single in 1988 and reached #6 on the Billboard Hot 100 and #19 on the Mainstream rock charts.
